mapper.insert: insert into question (id, question_body_url, answer_body_url, discipline_id, source_type_id, difficulty_type_id, question_type_id, estimated_time_to_finish, creator_id, update_operator_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{questionBodyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answerBodyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disciplineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sourceTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{difficultyTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{questionTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{estimatedTimeToFinish,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update question set question_body_url = #{questionBodyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answer_body_url = #{answerBodyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discipline_id = #{disciplineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, source_type_id = #{sourceTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, difficulty_type_id = #{difficultyTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, question_type_id = #{questionTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, estimated_time_to_finish = #{estimatedTimeToFinish,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creation_time = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_operator_id = #{updateOperatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, question_body_url, answer_body_url, discipline_id, source_type_id, difficulty_type_id, question_type_id, estimated_time_to_finish, creator_id, creation_time, update_operator_id, update_time from question where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, question_body_url, answer_body_url, discipline_id, source_type_id, difficulty_type_id, question_type_id, estimated_time_to_finish, creator_id, creation_time, update_operator_id, update_time from question
